channel.title: Events on New Challenge Ministries
channel.description: Recent content in Events on New Challenge Ministries

item.title: Christmas Toy Drive 2020
item.description: This Christmas, we’ve handed out 400 toys to local kids in need. Each child received 3 toys during this event, which was conducted as a drive-thru event in light of Covid-19. As such we sadly were not able to have face painting or Santa present this year but nonetheless we’re proud to have helped so many kids have a brighter Christmas.

item.title: Easter 2021
item.description: This Easter we’re going to eat eggs.

item.title: Thanksgiving Handout 2020
item.description: This Thanksgiving, we handed out 400 meals to the local community. Served by the local community and military personnel, this event was a staggering feat that worked like a well-oiled machine! It’s testament to the skill and dedication of our team to serve those in need. Thank you to all who volunteered on this big day!
